Title: Straight Life
Plot: The infiltration of drugs into Oz has reached unprecedented levels; and the undercover efforts of McManus and Glynn to find out who's smuggling it in backfires in a deadly way. Despite a lockdown in the Emerald City, drugs continue to trickle in--and the blame shifts from prisoners to corrupt officials.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
GuestStars: Richard Hamilton, Brian Tarantina, Kathleen Widdoes, Pat McNamara, Murphy Guyer, Cradeaux Alexander, Esther Swan, Ray Iannicelli, Steve Ryan
